about_the_game:
World

Dive into a modern world corrupted and damaged by mystical artifacts. You play as Anna, a young, manic, and impulsive but highly talented artifact hunter who REALLY loves music.

Gameplay

In Ready Beat Fire, your actions, as well as those of your enemies, the environment, and even buff effects, are all tied to the beat of the music. This is how Anna perceives this dangerous world.

Shoot to the beat, defeat enemies, improve yourself, unlock weapons and abilities, and see if you can survive the dangerous locations.

During your runs, you'll find artifacts that grant you their powers. Explore artifact combinations to create powerful builds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 2GB or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Ready Beat Fire is a rogue-lite rhythm shooter, where actions, environment, enemies and even buff effects are tied to the rhythm. Shoot to the beat, combine the artifacts powers and see how far you can go.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
